com.hush.pgp
Class MPI

java.lang.Object
  com.hush.pgp.MPI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MPI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Class MPI representing a 'Multi Precision Integer' (MPI) as specified in rfc2440. It uses the java.math.BigInteger class for the actual calculations.

See Also:

           java.io.OutputStream out,
           boolean includeLengthInOut)
    throws java.io.IOException
Construction of an MPI from an InputStream.

Parameters:
in - the stream from which the MPI will be read
out - MPI data read will also be written here
includeLengthInOut - write two octet length to out as well

java.io.IOException

parseAllMPIs

public static MPI[] parseAllMPIs(byte[] data,
                                 int offset,
                                 int len)
Creation of an array of MPI objects from its binary representation.

Parameters:
data - raw representation of MPI's
offset - starting point for reading the MPI's
len - the point in the array to stop reading.
Returns:
the resulting array of MPI's

parseAllMPIs

public static MPI[] parseAllMPIs(java.io.InputStream in)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Creation of an array of MPI objects from its binary representation. The buffer could contain arbitrarily many MPI.

Parameters:
in - the stream from which to read the MPI's
Returns:
the resulting array of MPI's
Throws:
java.io.IOException
